programme.title: Harriet the Spy
programme.desc: Harriet M. Welsch is a spy. But when Harriet's friends find her secret notebook the tables are turned on her. Can she win her friends back and still keep on going with the spy business?

programme.title: Enchanted Princess
programme.desc: A young Prince sets out on a mission to find a missing Princess from the neighborhood kingdom. Along the journey, Prince meets a dragon who joins him on an adventure.

programme.title: Dragon Hunters
programme.desc: Zoe is a little girl who believes in fairy tales. So in order to help her uncle Lord Arnold gets rid of a terrible dragon, Zoe decides she has to find some heroes.

programme.title: The Ugly Duckling and Me
programme.desc: Pretending to be the father of a lost duck egg, Ratso, a city rat, is allowed to remain in the poultry-yard where he found shelter. But it comes at a price!

programme.title: Beyond Beyond
programme.desc: Johan is a little rabbit who has lived at sea with his father. Johan dreams of steering the ship and visiting the Kingdom of the Feather King, as he believes this is where his mother is.

programme.title: You Can Tutu
programme.desc: Sometimes it's hard to be yourself, but 12-year-old Tutu Marlow hasn't ever really had that problem. That is until her first day at Best Pointe Ballet School.

programme.title: Driven to Dance
programme.desc: A young ballet dancer must convince herself and her mother that she has what it takes to make it in the world of dance.

programme.desc: After his brother returns home from war, Jacob Singer struggles to maintain his sanity. Plagued by hallucinations and flashbacks, Singer rapidly falls apart.
